summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Grand Boulevard, from Twenty-first Avenue West to Twenty-ninth Avenue West; Whalley Place, from Grand Boulevard to West Bertona Street; Twenty-sixth Avenue West, from Grand Boulevard to West Fulton Street; Twenty-seventh Avenue West and Twenty-eighth Avenue West, each from west Bertona Street to West Ray Street; and Twenty-ninth August West, from Grand Boulevard to the south line of Buena Vista Addition to the City of Seattle, No. 2, all in the City of Seattle, by laying water mains therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary gates, tees, crosses and other appurtenances for the proper water service of said district, all in accordance with Resolution No. 1322 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
